mapper.select: select level, Notice_notiNO, Notice_parentNO, LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1)) || Notice_title Notice_title, Notice_content, Notice_Date, Notice_filename, Notice_id, Notice_name from notice start with Notice_parentNO=0 connect by prior Notice_notiNO=Notice_parentNO order siblings by Notice_notiNO desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_title, notice_content, notice_filename, notice_id, notice_parentNO, notice_name) values (#{notice_title},#{notice_content},#{notice_filename},#{notice_id},#{notice_parentNO}, #{notice_name})
